newsitem.title: USA: Grand Casinos Q4 loss expands after charges.
newsitem.headline: Grand Casinos Q4 loss expands after charges.

text.p: Grand Casinos Inc said Tuesday its higher losses in the fourth quarter ended December 29 reflected charges for a corporate restructuring and a writedown of its investments in Stratosphere Corp.
The company reported a net loss of $141.5 million, or $3.39 a share, compared to a loss of $1.8 million, or $0.05 a share, in the corresponding period one year ago.
The latest results include a restructuring charge of $0.17 a share and the Stratosphere writedown, which totaled $3.22 a share. Operating income was $0.24 a share, versus $0.47.
Grand Casinos owns and operates casino hotel resorts.
Its shares closed down 1/4 Tuesday at 11-3/8.
